Name: Kanban Plus
Description: A fork of Obsidian Kanban with cross-file list management and Full Calendar integration for power users who want more from markdown-backed task boards.

Name: Full Calendar Plus
Description: A fork of Obsidian Full Calendar adding a linear year view and property-based filtering so you can see your projects as time-spans alongside daily events.

Name: Thousand Words
Description: An Obsidian plugin for searching and browsing images in your vault with text-based content search. [In Development]
